languages.text: "Да оградит нас Азуриан от подобного несчастья!" {n}Шайрэнкхей складывает на груди изящный жест, но лицо его кривится в ужасе.{/n} "Нет. Я не допущу гибели еще одного мира от рук мон-кай, даже если придется отдать за это душу!"

traits.locale_text: "Да оградит нас Азуриан от подобного несчастья!" {n}Шайрэнкхей складывает на груди изящный жест, но лицо его кривится в ужасе.{/n} "Нет. Я не допущу гибели еще одного мира от рук мон-кай, даже если придется отдать за это душу!"

languages.text: "May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"
languages.original_text: "Да оградит нас Азуриан от подобного несчастья!" {n}Шайрэнкхей складывает на груди изящный жест, но лицо его кривится в ужасе.{/n} "Нет. Я не допущу гибели еще одного мира от рук мон-кай, даже если придется отдать за это душу!"

traits.locale_text: "May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on the chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

"May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on the chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

"May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

"May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

"May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

"May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

languages.text: «¡Asuryan nos guarde de esta calamidad!». {n}Shairenkhei se cruza de brazos con gracilidad, pero el terror de su cara es manifiesto.{/n} «No. ¡No permitiré que otro mundo más perezca a manos de los mon-keigh, aunque para ello tenga que renunciar a mi alma!».
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Asuryan nos guarde de esta calamidad!». {n}Shairenkhei se cruza de brazos con gracilidad, pero el terror de su cara es manifiesto.{/n} «No. ¡No permitiré que otro mundo más perezca a manos de los mon-keigh, aunque para ello tenga que renunciar a mi alma!».

languages.text: “愿阿苏焉将我们从这场灾难中拯救出来！”{n}榭伦凯以优雅的姿势将双臂交叉在胸前，但他脸上却带着显而易见的恐惧。{/n}“不，我决不能让另一个方舟世界在猴子的手中毁灭，哪怕要舍弃我的灵魂，我也要阻止这种事情！”
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

traits.locale_text: “愿阿苏焉将我们从这场灾难中拯救出来！”{n}榭伦凯以优雅的姿势将双臂交叉在胸前，但他脸上却带着显而易见的恐惧。{/n}“不，我决不能让另一个方舟世界在猴子的手中毁灭，哪怕要舍弃我的灵魂，我也要阻止这种事情！”

languages.text: « Qu'Asuryan nous en préserve ! » {n}Shairenkhei croise gracieusement les bras sur sa poitrine, mais il ne parvient pas à cacher son expression horrifiée.{/n} « Non, je ne laisserai pas un autre monde périr aux mains des mon-keigh, même si cela m'oblige à damner mon âme ! »
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'Asuryan nous en préserve ! » {n}Shairenkhei croise gracieusement les bras sur sa poitrine, mais il ne parvient pas à cacher son expression horrifiée.{/n} « Non, je ne laisserai pas un autre monde périr aux mains des mon-keigh, même si cela m'oblige à damner mon âme ! »

languages.text: 「アシュリアンが、我らをこの災厄より救わんことを！」{n}シャイレンケイは優雅な仕草で両腕を胸の上で組むが、その顔には恐怖が表れている。{/n}「たとえ私の魂を捨てることになろうとも、モン＝ケイの手によってさらなる世界が滅びることは許さない！」
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンが、我らをこの災厄より救わんことを！」{n}シャイレンケイは優雅な仕草で両腕を胸の上で組むが、その顔には恐怖が表れている。{/n}「たとえ私の魂を捨てることになろうとも、モン＝ケイの手によってさらなる世界が滅びることは許さない！」

languages.text: "Möge Asuryan uns vor diesem Leid bewahren!" {n}Shairenkhei verschränkt in einer dankbaren Geste die Arme vor der Brust, doch das Entsetzen steht ihm ins Gesicht geschrieben.{/n} "Nein. Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass noch eine weitere Welt durch die Hände der Chem-Pan-Sey stirbt, selbst wenn ich dafür meine Seele aufgeben muss!"
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Möge Asuryan uns vor diesem Leid bewahren!" {n}Shairenkhei verschränkt in einer dankbaren Geste die Arme vor der Brust, doch das Entsetzen steht ihm ins Gesicht geschrieben.{/n} "Nein. Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass noch eine weitere Welt durch die Hände der Chem-Pan-Sey stirbt, selbst wenn ich dafür meine Seele aufgeben muss!"

languages.text: "Asuryan bizi bu kederden kurtarsın!" {n}Shairenkhei, zarif bir hareketle kollarını göğsünün üzerinde birleştiriyor ancak yüzündeki korku aşikâr.{/n} "Hayır. Bir dünyanın daha mon-keigh ellerinde yok olmasına izin vermeyeceğim. Ruhumdan vazgeçme pahasına bile olsa!"
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan save us from this woe!" {n}Shairenkhei folds his arms on his chest in a graceful gesture, but the horror is obvious on his face.{/n} "No. I will not allow another world to perish at the hands of the mon-keigh, even if this means forsaking my soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Asuryan bizi bu kederden kurtarsın!" {n}Shairenkhei, zarif bir hareketle kollarını göğsünün üzerinde birleştiriyor ancak yüzündeki korku aşikâr.{/n} "Hayır. Bir dünyanın daha mon-keigh ellerinde yok olmasına izin vermeyeceğim. Ruhumdan vazgeçme pahasına bile olsa!"
